D

disconnect(MulticastSocket) - Method in class stream.envoyerUDP
Listener thread disconnect method This method allows one to disconnect by simply typing 'quit'

E

EcouteUDP - Class in stream
Listening thread for the UDP Multicast CLient
envoyerUDP - Class in stream
Sender thread for the UDP Multicast CLient

G

groupAdress - Static variable in class stream.UDPMain
 
groupPort - Static variable in class stream.UDPMain
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class stream.UDPMain
 

N

nickname - Static variable in class stream.UDPMain
 

R

run() - Method in class stream.EcouteUDP
Listener thread run method This is the part where when we start the listener thread, it creates Datagram packets depending on what it receives from the UDP group it joined
run() - Method in class stream.envoyerUDP
Listener thread run method This is the part where when we start the sender thread, it creates Datagram packets depending on what it will send from the UDP group it joined The package will contain what was typed by the client via his terminal

S

stream - package stream
 

U

UDPMain - Class in stream
Main to create the client's threads to join a Multicast UDP server group chat
UDPMain() - Constructor for class stream.UDPMain
